title: Better error messages for command line tool

content.raw:
I wasn't sure about the usage of the `--force-version` option, so I was trying to do simply:

`ign --force-version 2.1.0`

or

`ign service --force-version 2.1.0`

This just prints the help messages `ign -h` and `ign service -h` respectively, which didn't tell me anything about what I was doing wrong. In fact, it looked to me like the option wasn't valid. It took me a while to find out that the option must be used together with other options, for example:

`ign topic -l --force-version 2.1.0`

It would be nice to have informative error messages when the user is misusing a command.
